Name: Achievement Lurker: Easiest Cosmetic Numbers
About the game: In the magical land of cosmetic items our hero must battle monsters in breathtaking turn based battles, in order to win cosmetic numbers. As you play you will level up via the XP system. You will also fight a boss fight that will require the upmost skill and dedication. Enjoy the rich environment and talkative NPC characters. Most of all, obtain cosmetic numbers Turn based combat XP level system Boss fight NPC
